section.title: <radio> [new in 0.36]
section.para: A radio setting. Its representation is a radio selection widget with items defined by <item> child tags.

row.entry: The name of the variable or property to which the configuration element is bound.
[new in 0.34] A callback function which is called every time the value changes. The callback takes the name of the bound property and the new value as arguments.
[new in 0.34] Whether the config item is enabled. Disabled items appear greyed out.
The tooltip text for the element in the configuration dialog.
The label text for the element in the configuration dialog.
The items which are children of an radio can be accessed via this variable. You will get a list of tuples in the form of (label, value).

section.title: Examples
section.programlisting:
<radio id="radio" label="Accept cookies: " bind="cookies" >
<item label="Always" value="always"/> <item label="Ask me" value="ask_me"/> <item label="Never" value="never"/>
</radio>
